Title: File Backup
Description: This project is an open source windows azure cloud backup win forms application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is an open source windows azure cloud backup win forms application.

Project Details
This application will allow scheduling of folders to be backup to windows azure cloud.

http://azurestorageexplorer.codeplex.com/ - provided a windows azure file browser
